column4: hey guys, i have a bunch of pictures that i want to set to cycle as my screensaver. can i do that in ubuntu?
lol i cant find the option to do it
i assume its in the screensaver preferences window
well see, i dont want to cycle through screensavers. just some pictures that i took
would it be this "image manipulation" thing?
you think it would be in the screensavers list
wouldn't you!  I'm trying to find it too
I can't find anything.  That's really quite strange.  Why no 'image' screensaver?
from what i am reading, i think there is one in kde
I remember something in KDE, yes.
yes, it is in the list
